Hi Maverick, I know I'm just joining the rest when I say this but I cannot figure what I'm doing wrong. In your instructions you say REPLACE the existing .dat file but there isn't one to replace. I'm thinking this is where we all might be going wrong? I have followed every other step to the T and still activation and phone codes are not working. Help a girl out please!

GUYS. i created an account on piratebay for the sole purpose of telling you all why the crack isn't working for the activation codes. at least, why mine wasn't working. i was copying mdm.dat and pasting it into the resources folder of the package that was in the SAME folder as the readme document. there was no option to replace. what you actually have to do is open a new finder window, navigate to rosetta stone in applications, right click "show package contents" and then resources, and paste it there. this time it will replace another mdm.dat file. it worked for me after that, and the xxxx activation codes were valid. i don't know if this is the same reason that you all were having trouble, but i thought it was worth sharing. good luck!
I doubt that's the mistake that I was making as I have been copying the .dat to the folder inside the already installed application.

update: mine still says the codes are invalid if i go to "activate products" and enter the xxxxx codes for the five levels. nothing is listed under "activated products," but i still have all the content and it works as it is supposed to, as far as i can tell. one difference i noticed was that when i copied the mdm.dat file properly, i was prompted to create a user account on first opening the program, while when it was copied improperly, the 'add language' screen came up first. dastewe, have you tried skipping activation and creating a user account?

I'll try but as you said it works correctly when it asks for a user account FIRST where for me it just goes to activation where I get the errors. I can make a user account but, I reckon, I'll just end up getting the limited version that you can get w/o activating it.
